# Draft:US Iran war

2025 United States Airstrikes on Iranian Nuclear Sites
June 21–22, 2025
Location: Fordow, Natanz, and Esfahan nuclear facilities, Iran
On the night of June 21, 2025, U.S. President Donald Trump announced that U.S. military aircraft—believed to include B‑2 Spirit stealth bombers armed with heavy “bunker-buster” munitions—carried out precision airstrikes on three of Iran’s primary nuclear sites: Fordow, Natanz, and Esfahan
This marked the first direct U.S. military strike on Iranian territory. Fordow was identified as the "primary site" and reportedly received a full payload of bombs
